atk-s0303a0:4_5: Bhesakaḷāvaneti bhesakaḷāya nāma yakkhiniyā adhivutthattā evaṃladdhanāme vane.
atk-s0303a0:4_6: Tadeva migagaṇassa abhayatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0303a0:4_7: Bhagavā tasmiṃ janapade taṃ nagaraṃ nissāya tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0303a0:5_4: Vayoanuppattoti tesu tīsu addhesu pacchimavayaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0303a0:5_6: Idañhi sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi niccapaggharaṇaṭṭhena āturaṃyeva nāma.
atk-s0303a0:5_7: Visesena panassa jarāturatā byādhāturatā maraṇāturatāti tisso āturatā honti.
atk-s0303a0:5_11: Aniccadassāvīti tāya āturatāya icchiticchitakkhaṇe āgantuṃ asakkonto kadācideva daṭṭhuṃ labhāmi,
atk-s0303a0:5_14: Yesu hi diṭṭhesu kusalavasena cittaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0303a0:5_19: Otiṇṇe vā vatthusmiṃ vacanaṃ ovādo nāma,
atk-s0303a0:5_20: anotiṇṇe tantivasena vā paveṇivasena vā vuttaṃ anusāsanī nāma.
atk-s0303a0:5_21: Apica ovādoti vā anusāsanīti vā atthato ekameva,
atk-s0303a0:6_3: Yathā kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ vā mayūraṇḍaṃ vā geṇḍukaṃ viya gahetvā khipantena vā paharantena vā na sakkā kīḷituṃ,
atk-s0303a0:6_5: evamayampi kāyo kaṇṭakepi khāṇukepi pakkhalitassa bhijjatīti aṇḍaṃ viya bhūtoti aṇḍabhūto.
atk-s0303a0:6_8: tena ḍaṃsamakasādayo nilīyitvāpi chaviṃ chinditvā yūsaṃ paggharāpetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0303a0:6_9: Imasmiṃ pana chaviṃ chinditvā yaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0303a0:6_14: Tasmāti yasmā ayaṃ kāyo evarūpo, tasmā.
atk-s0303a0:7_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti rañño cakkavattissa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā anantaraṃ pariṇāyakaratanassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto rājapuriso viya,
atk-s0303a0:7_2: anantaraṃ dhammasenāpatissa apacitiṃ kātukāmo yenāyasmā sāriputto,
atk-s0303a0:7_10: Etassa ca pariyodātataṃ disvāva indriyānaṃ vippasannataṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0303a0:8_0: Kathañhi no siyāti kena kāraṇena na laddhā bhavissati?
atk-s0303a0:8_4: Ayaṃ kira satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pitipemaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:8_8: Sā kira upāsikā pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa mātāva, so ca, gahapati,
atk-s0303a0:8_13: Evaṃ satthā diyaḍḍhaattabhāvasahassaṃ tesaṃyeva hatthe vaḍḍhito.
atk-s0303a0:8_19: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ vissāsikānaṃ yadidaṃ nakulapitā gahapati,
atk-s0303a0:8_20: yadidaṃ nakulamātā gahapatānī”ti te etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0303a0:8_21: Iti so imaṃ vissāsikabhāvaṃ pakāsento kathañhi no siyāti āha.
atk-s0303a0:8_22: Amatena abhisittoti nassidha aññaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ vā vipassanā vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā “amatābhiseko”ti daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0303a0:9_4: sadevakena ca lokena araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti.
atk-s0303a0:9_5: Buddhā eva vā idha ariyā. Yathāha –
atk-s0303a0:9_9: Sappurisānanti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca sappurisāti veditabbā.
atk-s0303a0:9_10: Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā.
atk-s0303a0:9_12: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca,
atk-s0303a0:14_0: “Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī”ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto,
atk-s0303a0:14_8: Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi adiṭṭhāva honti tesaṃ cakkhūnaṃ vaṇṇamattaggahaṇato na ariyabhāvagocarato.
atk-s0303a0:15_1: cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā,
atk-s0303a0:15_7: “idhekacco mahallako ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā sahacarantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-s0303a0:15_11: ñāṇena dassanameva dassanaṃ. Yathāha – “kiṃ te, vakkali,
atk-s0303a0:15_12: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0303a0:15_17: Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto,
atk-s0303a0:15_18: ariyādhigatañca dhammaṃ anadhigacchanto ariyakaradhammānaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca adiṭṭhattā “ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a0:19_1: Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekameko vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati.
atk-s0303a0:19_2: Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho.
atk-s0303a0:20_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro.
atk-s0303a0:25_3: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato “saṃvaro” vinayanato “vinayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0303a0:25_4: Evaṃ tāva saṃvaravinayo pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a0:26_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa,
atk-s0303a0:26_1: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:27_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa,
atk-s0303a0:27_3: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0303a0:27_4: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:28_2: Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:28_5: Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0303a0:29_1: bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo bhinnasaṃvarattā pahātabbassa ca appahīnattā yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi,
atk-s0303a0:29_3: Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthāpi.
atk-s0303a0:30_14: ariyavinayeti vā sappurisavinayeti vā esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0303a0:31_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati,
atk-s0303a0:31_2: taṃ rūpa”nti rūpañca attañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a0:31_3: Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci, so vaṇṇo. Yo vaṇṇo,
atk-s0303a0:31_4: sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati,
atk-s0303a0:31_6: advayaṃ samanupassatīti evaṃ rūpaṃ “attā”ti diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
atk-s0303a0:31_7: Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya taṃ rūpavantaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a0:31_8: Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a0:31_9: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā karaṇḍake maṇiṃ viya taṃ attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0303a0:31_12: mama rūpa”nti evaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gaṇhanako nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0303a0:31_13: Tassa taṃ rūpanti tassa taṃ evaṃ gahitaṃ rūpaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:32_0: Tattha “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:32_5: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:32_8: vedanāya vā attāna”nti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito.
atk-s0303a0:32_9: Tattha “rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0303a0:32_10: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā,
atk-s0303a0:32_11: avasesesu sassatadiṭṭhīti evamettha pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti,
atk-s0303a0:33_1: āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto cāti kāyo nāma buddhānampi āturoyeva.
atk-s0303a0:33_4: No ca āturacittoti idha nikkilesatāya cittassa anāturabhāvo dassito.
atk-s0303a0:33_5: Iti imasmiṃ sutte lokiyamahājano āturakāyo ceva āturacitto cāti dassito,
atk-s0303a0:35_5: Tassa avidūre nigamo devadahantveva napuṃsakaliṅgavasena saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0303a0:35_6: Pacchābhūmagamikāti pacchābhūmaṃ aparadisāyaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ janapadaṃ gantukāmā.
atk-s0303a0:35_12: Yo hi ekavihāre vasantopi santikaṃ na gacchati pakkamanto anāpucchā pakkamati,
atk-s0303a0:35_17: Imepi bhikkhū bhagavā “evamime sīlādīhi vaḍḍhissantī”ti sabhāre kātukāmo āpucchāpeti.
atk-s0303a0:36_1: Anuggāhakoti āmisānuggahena ca dhammānuggahena cāti dvīhipi anuggahehi anuggāhako.
atk-s0303a0:36_2: Thero kira aññe bhikkhū viya pātova piṇḍāya agantvā sabbabhikkhūsu gatesu sakalaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ anuvicaranto asammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjati,
atk-s0303a0:36_6: “Mā aññatitthiyā vihāraṃ paviṭṭhā disvā paribhavaṃ akaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0303a0:36_7: Tato gilānasālaṃ gantvā gilāne assāsetvā “kenattho”ti pucchitvā yena attho hoti,
atk-s0303a0:36_8: tadatthaṃ tesaṃ daharasāmaṇere ādāya bhikkhācāravattena vā sabhāgaṭṭhāne vā bhesajjaṃ pariyesitvā tesaṃ datvā,
atk-s0303a0:36_10: gacchatha sappurisā appamattā hothā”ti te pesetvā sayaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā upaṭṭhākakule vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0303a0:37_0: Bhagavati pana cārikaṃ caramāne “ahaṃ aggasāvako”ti upāhanaṃ āruyha chattaṃ gahetvā purato purato na gacchati.
atk-s0303a0:37_1: Ye pana tattha mahallakā vā ābādhikā vā atidaharā vā,
atk-s0303a0:37_2: tesaṃ rujjanaṭṭhānāni telena makkhāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ attano daharasāmaṇerehi gāhāpetvā taṃdivasaṃ vā dutiyadivasaṃ vā te gaṇhitvāva gacchati.
atk-s0303a0:37_3: Ekadivasañhi taññeva āyasmantaṃ ativikāle sampattattā senāsanaṃ alabhitvā,
atk-s0303a0:37_9: Ovadanto panesa satavārampi sahassavārampi tāva ovadati,
atk-s0303a0:37_12: Iminā nayena ovadato cassa ovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā.
atk-s0303a0:38_7: Athettha catūhi pādehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā tassa upari taṃ gumbaṃ āropesuṃ,
atk-s0303a0:38_9: Athassa heṭṭhā iṭṭhakāhi paricinitvā vālikaṃ okiritvā āsanaṃ paññāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0303a0:39_0: Nānāverajjagatanti ekassa rañño rajjato nānāvidhaṃ rajjagataṃ.
atk-s0303a0:39_3: evaṃ nivuttharajjato aññaṃ rajjaṃ virajjaṃ nāma,
atk-s0303a0:39_19: Imināpi vādaṃ anugato vādoyeva dīpito hoti.
atk-s0303a0:42_4: Tassa kira pabbatassa ekaṃ passaṃ chinditvā pātitaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0303a0:42_7: Iti thero tasmiṃ raṭṭhe taṃ nagaraṃ nissāya tasmiṃ pabbate viharati.
atk-s0303a0:42_9: Aṭṭhakavaggiye māgaṇḍiyapañheti aṭṭhakavaggikamhi māgaṇḍiyapañho nāma atthi,
atk-s0303a0:43_4: purejātañca kammaviññāṇaṃ pacchājātassa kammaviññāṇassapi vipākaviññāṇassapi vipākaviññāṇañca vipākaviññāṇassapi kammaviññāṇassapi paccayo hoti,
atk-s0303a0:43_7: tassa vighātatthaṃ taṃ agahetvā asambhinnāva desanā katā.
atk-s0303a0:43_8: Apica ārammaṇavasena catasso abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttāti tā dassetumpi idha viññāṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:44_2: Cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayāti akusalacittassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtā ceva abhinivesabhūtā ca anusayabhūtā ca.
atk-s0303a0:44_5: satthu pana khīṇāsavabhāvo loke atipākaṭoti uparimakoṭiyā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:44_8: Kilesā hi na kevalaṃ catūsuyeva khandhesu pahīnā pahīyanti,
atk-s0303a0:44_9: pañcasupi pahīyantiyevāti kilesappahānadassanatthaṃ gahitaṃ. Evaṃ kho, gahapati,
atk-s0303a0:44_10: anokasārī hotīti evaṃ kammaviññāṇena okaṃ asarantena anokasārī nāma hoti.
atk-s0303a0:45_3: Ubhayenapi hi kilesānaṃ patthaṭabhāvo ca vinibandhanabhāvo ca vutto,
atk-s0303a0:45_5: tasmā rūpanimittaniketamhi uppannena kilesavisārena ceva kilesabandhanena cāti attho.
atk-s0303a0:45_6: Niketasārīti vuccatīti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ sārīti vuccati.
atk-s0303a0:46_3: Samānepi hi etesaṃ ālayaṭṭhena visayabhāve okoti niccanivāsanaṭṭhānagehameva vuccati,
atk-s0303a0:46_4: niketanti “ajja asukaṭṭhāne kīḷissāmā”ti katasaṅketaṭṭhānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ uyyānādi.
atk-s0303a0:46_5: Tattha yathā puttadāradhanadhaññapuṇṇagehe chandarāgo balavā hoti,
atk-s0303a0:46_7: Yathā pana uyyānaṭṭhānādīsu tato dubbalataro hoti,
atk-s0303a0:46_8: evaṃ bāhiresu chasu ārammaṇesūti chandarāgassa balavadubbalatāya evaṃ desanā katāti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a0:47_0: Sukhitesu sukhitoti upaṭṭhākesu dhanadhaññalābhādivasena sukhitesu “idānāhaṃ manāpaṃ bhojanaṃ labhissāmī”ti gehasitasukhena sukhito hoti,
atk-s0303a0:47_2: Dukkhitesu dukkhitoti tesaṃ kenacideva kāraṇena dukkhe uppanne sayaṃ dviguṇena dukkhena dukkhito hoti.
atk-s0303a0:47_4: Tesu yogaṃ āpajjatīti upayogaṃ sayaṃ tesaṃ kiccānaṃ kattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0303a0:47_6: kāmehi aritto hotīti evaṃ kilesakāmehi aritto hoti anto kāmānaṃ bhāvena atuccho.
atk-s0303a0:47_7: Sukkapakkho tesaṃ abhāvena ritto tucchoti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a0:48_1: Evaṃrūpo siyantiādīsu dīgharassakāḷodātādīsu rūpesu “evaṃrūpo nāma bhaveyya”nti pattheti.
atk-s0303a0:48_5: cakkhuviññāṇādīsu viññāṇesu “evaṃ viññāṇo nāma bhaveyya”nti pattheti.
atk-s0303a0:49_2: asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:49_4: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīghena kālena paricitaṃ suppaguṇaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:49_5: taṃ mama vādaṃ āgamma sabbaṃ khaṇena viparāvattaṃ nivattaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:49_6: Āropito te vādoti tuyhaṃ doso mayā āropito.
atk-s0303a0:49_7: Cara vādappamokkhāyāti taṃ taṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uttari pariyesanto imassa vādassa mokkhāya cara āhiṇḍāhi.
atk-s0303a0:49_8: Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha sayameva pahosi,
atk-s0303a0:51_3: Taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttāti taṇhāsaṅkhaye nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimuttā.
atk-s0303a0:53_1: Pañcame samādhinti idaṃ bhagavā te bhikkhū cittekaggatāya parihāyante disvā,
atk-s0303a0:53_2: “cittekaggataṃ labhantānaṃ imesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvā āha.
atk-s0303a0:53_4: Abhivadatīti tāya abhinandanāya “aho piyaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti vadati.
atk-s0303a0:53_5: Vācaṃ abhinandantopi ca taṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissāya evaṃ lobhaṃ uppādento abhivadatiyeva nāma.
atk-s0303a0:53_7: Yā rūpe nandīti yā sā rūpe balavapatthanāsaṅkhātā nandī.
atk-s0303a0:53_11: Vipassanācittena cetasā “aniccaṃ dukkha”nti vacībhedaṃ karontopi nābhivadatiyeva. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:55_1: Chaṭṭhe paṭisallāṇeti idaṃ bhagavā te bhikkhū kāyavivekena parihāyante disvā “kāyavivekaṃ labhantānaṃ
atk-s0303a0:55_2: imesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvā āha. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:57_3: Rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattiviññāṇaṃ hotīti “mama rūpaṃ vipariṇata”nti vā “ahu vata metaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:57_4: dāni vata me natthī”ti vā ādinā nayena kammaviññāṇaṃ rūpassa bhedānuparivatti hoti.
atk-s0303a0:57_6: Paritassanā dhammasamuppādāti taṇhāparitassanā ca akusaladhammasamuppādā ca.

atk-s0303a0:208_1: Dhammadesanaṃ sutvāti imaṃ pañcasu khandhesu paṇṇāsalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā.

atk-s0303a0:208_6: Itaresaṃ pana devānaṃ “tāso heso bhikkhū”ti aniccataṃ manasikarontānaṃ cittutrāsabhayampi,
atk-s0303a0:208_10: Iti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhe vaṭṭadosaṃ dassetvā tilakkhaṇāhataṃ katvā dhammaṃ desente ñāṇabhayaṃ nāma okkamati.
atk-s0303a0:209_2: Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0303a0:209_3: Desanāñāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0303a0:209_6: Taṃ panesa yāva aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa sotāpattiphalaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0303a0:209_8: Tasmiṃ uppanne pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:211_1: Sattame pubbenivāsanti na idaṃ abhiññāvasena anussaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:211_2: vipassanāvasena pana pubbenivāsaṃ anussarante samaṇabrāhmaṇe sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:211_6: Abhiññāvasena hi samanussarantassa khandhāpi upādānakkhandhāpi khandhapaṭibaddhāpi paṇṇattipi ārammaṇaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-s0303a0:211_7: Rūpaṃyeva anussaratīti evañhi anussaranto na aññaṃ kiñci sattaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā anussarati,
atk-s0303a0:212_3: Yathā hi naṭṭhaṃ goṇaṃ pariyesamāno puriso gogaṇe caramāne rattaṃ vā kāḷaṃ vā balībaddaṃ disvāpi na ettakeneva
atk-s0303a0:212_4: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ goṇo”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0303a0:212_6: Sarīrapadese panassa sattisūlādilakkhaṇaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ santako”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0303a0:212_7: evameva suññatāya kathitāyapi yāva suññatālakkhaṇaṃ na kathīyati,
atk-s0303a0:212_9: lakkhaṇe pana kathite kathitā nāma hoti.
atk-s0303a0:212_12: Yathā goṇalakkhaṇe asallakkhite goṇo na suṭṭhu sallakkhito hoti,
atk-s0303a0:212_13: tasmiṃ pana sallakkhite so sallakkhito nāma hoti,
atk-s0303a0:212_14: evameva suññatālakkhaṇe akathite suññatā akathitāva hoti,
atk-s0303a0:212_15: tasmiṃ pana kathite sā kathitā nāma hotīti suññatālakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ kiñca,
atk-s0303a0:213_8: Sītenapi ruppatītiādīsu sītena tāva ruppanaṃ lokantarikaniraye pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:213_9: Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇañhi cakkavāḷānaṃ antare ekeko lokantarikanirayo nāma hoti aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo.
atk-s0303a0:213_14: te vagguliyo viya pabbatapāde dīghaputhulehi nakhehi laggitvā avaṃsirā olambanti.
atk-s0303a0:213_17: Maññamānā tattha byāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārake udake patanti,
atk-s0303a0:213_18: vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti,
atk-s0303a0:213_19: patitamattāva accantakhāre udake tattatele patitapiṭṭhapiṇḍi viya paṭapaṭāyamānā vilīyanti.
atk-s0303a0:213_22: Tattha hi sattā sītena bhinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayampi pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0303a0:214_1: Jighacchāya ruppanaṃ pettivisaye ceva dubbhikkhakāle ca pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:214_3: Eko kira kālakañjikaasuro pipāsaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto yojanagambhīravitthāraṃ mahāgaṅgaṃ otari,
atk-s0303a0:214_7: Tassa udakasaddaṃ sutvā ito cito ca vicarantasseva ratti vibhāyi.
atk-s0303a0:214_8: Atha naṃ pātova bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā tiṃsamattā piṇḍacārikabhikkhū disvā “ko nāma tvaṃ sappurisā”ti?
atk-s0303a0:214_21: Bhikkhū tiṃsamatte patte nīharitvā udakaṃ āharitvā tassa mukhe āsiñciṃsu.
atk-s0303a0:214_22: Tesaṃ tathā karontānaṃyeva velā upakaṭṭhā jātā.
atk-s0303a0:214_26: tiṃsamattānaṃ ayyānaṃ tiṃsapattehi āsittaudakato aḍḍhapasatamattampi paragalaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0303a0:215_10: Ekā kira itthī marukantāre rattiṃ satthato ohīnā divā sūriye uggacchante vālikāya tappamānāya pāde ṭhapetuṃ asakkontī sīsato pacchiṃ otāretvā akkami.
atk-s0303a0:215_11: Kamena pacchiyā uṇhābhitattāya ṭhātuṃ asakkontī tassā upari sāṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā akkami.
atk-s0303a0:215_12: Tasmimpi santatte attano aṅkena gahitaputtakaṃ adhomukhaṃ nipajjāpetvā kandantaṃyeva akkamitvā saddhiṃ tena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne uṇhābhitattā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0303a0:216_0: Sarīsapāti ye keci dīghajātikā sarantā gacchanti.
atk-s0303a0:216_1: Tesaṃ samphassena ruppanaṃ āsīvisadaṭṭhakādīnaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:216_2: Iti bhagavatā yāni imāni sāmaññapaccattavasena dhammānaṃ dve lakkhaṇāni,
atk-s0303a0:217_5: sukhampi vedayatīti sukhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti anubhavati.
atk-s0303a0:217_7: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ nāma jātanti?
atk-s0303a0:217_10: rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkanta”nti imasmiṃ mahālisutte āgatoyeva.
atk-s0303a0:217_12: na añño satto vā puggalo vā.
atk-s0303a0:217_15: Evamidha bhagavā vedanāyapi paccattalakkhaṇameva bhājetvā dassesi.
atk-s0303a0:218_0: Nīlampi sañjānātīti nīlapupphe vā vatthe vā parikammaṃ katvā upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā pāpento sañjānāti.
atk-s0303a0:218_1: Ayañhi saññā nāma parikammasaññāpi upacārasaññāpi appanāsaññāpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0303a0:218_4: Idhāpi bhagavā sañjānanalakkhaṇāya saññāya paccattalakkhaṇameva bhājetvā dassesi.
atk-s0303a0:219_0: Rūpaṃ rūpattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā yāgumeva yāguttāya,
atk-s0303a0:219_2: evaṃ paccayehi samāgantvā katabhāvena saṅkhatanti laddhanāmaṃ rūpameva rūpattāya yathā abhisaṅkhataṃ rūpaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0303a0:219_7: attanā saha jāyamānaṃ rūpaṃ sampayutte ca vedanādayo dhamme abhisaṅkharoti nibbattetīti.
atk-s0303a0:219_8: Idhāpi bhagavā cetayitalakkhaṇassa saṅkhārassa paccattalakkhaṇameva bhājetvā dassesi.
atk-s0303a0:220_2: Api cettha tittakanti nimbapaṭolādinānappakāraṃ kaṭukanti pippalimaricādinānappakāraṃ.
atk-s0303a0:220_5: Akhārikanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā phalajātaṃ kārapaṇṇādimissakapaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:220_8: Tasmā viññāṇanti vuccatīti yasmā imaṃ ambilādibhedaṃ aññamaññavisiṭṭhena ambilādibhāvena jānāti,
atk-s0303a0:220_10: Evamidhāpi bhagavā vijānanalakkhaṇassa viññāṇassa paccattalakkhaṇameva bhājetvā dassesi.
atk-s0303a0:221_0: Yasmā pana ārammaṇassa ākārasaṇṭhānagahaṇavasena saññā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0303a0:221_2: Yasmā vināpi ākārasaṇṭhānā ārammaṇassa paccattabhedagahaṇavasena viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0303a0:221_4: Imesaṃ pana saññāviññāṇapaññānaṃ asammohato sabhāvasallakkhaṇatthaṃ sañjānāti, vijānāti,
atk-s0303a0:221_10: aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a0:221_13: ussakkitvā pana maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a0:222_0: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake kahāpaṇarāsimhi kate ajātabuddhidārako gāmikapuriso mahāheraññikoti tīsu janesu
atk-s0303a0:222_1: oloketvā ṭhitesu ajātabuddhidārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittacaturassamaṇḍalādibhāvameva jānāti,
atk-s0303a0:222_10: Jānanto ca pana rūpaṃ disvāpi saddaṃ sutvāpi gandhaṃ ghāyitvāpi rasaṃ sāyitvāpi hatthena garulahubhāvaṃ upadhāretvāpi “asukagāme kato”tipi jānāti,
atk-s0303a0:222_13: Evameva saññā ajātabuddhidārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇamattameva jānāti.
atk-s0303a0:222_14: Viññāṇaṃ gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi jānāti,
atk-s0303a0:222_16: Paññā mahāheraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi jānāti,
atk-s0303a0:223_0: So pana nesaṃ viseso duppaṭivijjho. Tenāha āyasmā nāgaseno –
atk-s0303a0:224_5: imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe vattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ ‘ayaṃ phasso,
atk-s0303a0:225_0: Yathā hi tilatelaṃ sāsapatelaṃ madhukatelaṃ eraṇḍakatelaṃ vasātelanti imāni pañca telāni ekacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0303a0:225_1: divasaṃ yamakamanthe hi manthetvā tato “idaṃ tilatelaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:225_2: idaṃ sāsapatela”nti ekekassa pāṭiyekkaṃ uddharaṇaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0303a0:225_4: Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa suppaṭividdhattā dhammissaro dhammarājā imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe vattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0303a0:225_5: Pañcannaṃ mahānadīnaṃ samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhāne “idaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:225_6: idaṃ yamunāyā”ti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ udakuddharaṇenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0303a0:226_1: dutiyena suññatālakkhaṇanti dvīhi pabbehi anattalakkhaṇaṃ kathetvā idāni dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ tatra,
atk-s0303a0:226_3: Tattha khajjāmīti na rūpaṃ sunakho viya maṃsaṃ luñcitvā luñcitvā khādati,
atk-s0303a0:226_4: yathā pana kiliṭṭhavatthanivattho tatonidānaṃ pīḷaṃ sandhāya “khādati maṃ vattha”nti bhaṇati,
atk-s0303a0:226_5: evamidampi pīḷaṃ uppādentaṃ khādati nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:226_6: Paṭipanno hotīti sīlaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggā paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0303a0:226_7: Yo panettha balavañāṇo tikkhabuddhi ñāṇuttaro yogāvacaro padhānabhūmiyaṃ vāyamanto khāṇunā vā kaṇṭakena
atk-s0303a0:226_8: vā viddho āvudhena vā pahaṭo byagghādīhi vā gahetvā khajjamāno taṃ vedanaṃ abbohārikaṃ katvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0303a0:226_10: ayaṃ vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma vuccati pītamallatthero viya kuṭumbiyaputtamahātissatthero
atk-s0303a0:226_11: viya vattaniaṭaviyaṃ tiṃsamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññataro byagghamukhe nipannabhikkhu viya kaṇṭakena viddhatthero viya ca.
atk-s0303a0:227_0: Dvādasasu kira bhikkhūsu ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā araññe padhānamanuyuñjantesu eko sūriye atthaṅgatamatteyeva
atk-s0303a0:227_1: ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha caṅkamanto tiriyaṃ nimmathento tiṇapaṭicchannaṃ kaṇṭakaṃ akkami.
atk-s0303a0:227_8: “iminā kaṇṭakena viddhattā nirayādīsu bhayaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0303a0:227_10: So taṃ vedanaṃ abbohārikaṃ katvā sabbarattiṃ caṅkamitvā vibhātāya rattiyā aññassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0303a0:228_10: Visineti na ussinetīti vikirati na sampiṇḍeti.
atk-s0303a0:228_11: Vidhūpeti na sandhūpetīti nibbāpeti na jālāpeti.
atk-s0303a0:229_2: Vaṭṭaṃ vināsetvā ṭhitaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ dassessāmīti āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:229_4: idāni saha vipassanāya cattāro magge dassetuṃ idaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:229_5: Atha vā ettakena ṭhānena paṭhamamaggo kathito,
atk-s0303a0:229_6: idāni saha vipassanāya tayo magge dassetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:229_7: Ettakena vā ṭhānena tīṇi maggāni kathitāni,
atk-s0303a0:229_8: idāni saha vipassanāya arahattamaggaṃ dassetumpi idaṃ āraddhameva.
atk-s0303a0:230_2: dūrepi ṭhitaṃ namassantiyeva āyasmantaṃ nītattheraṃ viya.
atk-s0303a0:231_2: “ahaṃ ajjeva pabbajito ajjeva me pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:231_4: So paṃsukūlatthāya sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā coḷakaṃ pariyesanto vicari.
atk-s0303a0:231_5: Atheko mahābrahmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya manussapathaṃ olokento theraṃ disvā –
atk-s0303a0:231_6: “ajjeva pabbajitvā ajjeva khuragge arahattaṃ patvā mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ coḷakaṃ pariyesatī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0303a0:231_10: Ajjeva pabbajitvā ajjeva khuragge arahattaṃ patvā mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ coḷakaṃ pariyesatīti.
atk-s0303a0:243_0: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi vinivattetvā arahattassa kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0303a0:243_1: Desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:245_3: Kismiṃ pana kāraṇe ete bhagavatā paṇāmitāti?
atk-s0303a0:245_4: Ekasmiñhi antovasse bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vasitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthito
atk-s0303a0:245_5: nikkhamitvā janapadacārikaṃ caranto kapilavatthuṃ patvā nigrodhārāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0303a0:245_6: Sakyarājāno “satthā āgato”ti sutvā pacchābhatte kappiyāni telamadhuphāṇitādīni ceva pānakāni ca kājasatehi
atk-s0303a0:245_7: gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā saṅghassa niyyātetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā ekamante nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0303a0:245_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekacce bhikkhū senāsanaṃ paṭijagganti,
atk-s0303a0:245_16: amhākaṃ ācariyassa detha upajjhāyassa dethā”ti kathentā mahāsaddamakaṃsu.
atk-s0303a0:245_17: Satthā sutvā theraṃ pucchi “ke pana te, ānanda,
atk-s0303a0:245_25: Na hi mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni cīvarādihetu pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0303a0:245_26: nāpi ime bhikkhū cīvarādihetu agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā,
atk-s0303a0:245_27: arahattahetu pabbajitvā anatthaṃ atthasadisaṃ asāraṃ sārasadisaṃ karonti,
atk-s0303a0:246_6: Siyā aññathattanti pasādaññathattaṃ vā bhāvaññathattaṃ vā bhaveyya. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0303a0:246_7: “Sammāsambuddhena mayaṃ lahuke kāraṇe paṇāmitā”ti pasādaṃ mandaṃ karontānaṃ pasādaññathattaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0303a0:246_9: Siyā vipariṇāmoti ettha pana “mayaṃ satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmāti pabbajitā,
atk-s0303a0:246_10: naṃ gahetuṃ asakkontānaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti?
atk-s0303a0:246_14: Khīrūpako hi vaccho mātu adassanena khīraṃ alabhanto milāyati kampati pavedhati.
atk-s0303a0:246_16: So hi khīraṃ alabhamāno khīrapipāsāya sussanto patitvā marati.
atk-s0303a0:247_4: Tāni hi udakaṃ alabhantāni sukkhitvā vinassanti,
atk-s0303a0:247_6: Anuggahitoti āmisānuggahena ceva dhammānuggahena ca anuggahito.
atk-s0303a0:247_8: Acirapabbajitā hi sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca cīvarādipaccayavekalle vā sati gelaññe vā satthārā vā
atk-s0303a0:247_9: ācariyupajjhāyehi vā āmisānuggahena ananuggahitā kilamantā na sakkonti sajjhāyaṃ vā manasikāraṃ vā kātuṃ,
atk-s0303a0:247_10: dhammānuggahena ananuggahitā uddesena ceva ovādānusāsaniyā ca parihāyamānā na sakkonti akusalaṃ parivajjetvā kusalaṃ bhāvetuṃ.
atk-s0303a0:247_11: Imehi pana dvīhi anuggahehi anuggahitā kāyena akilamantā sajjhāyamanasikāre pavattitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0303a0:247_12: paṭipajjamānā aparabhāge taṃ anuggahaṃ alabhantāpi teneva purimānuggahena laddhabalā sāsane patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0303a0:248_0: Bhagavato purato pāturahosīti satthu cittaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0303a0:248_2: idāni nesaṃ anuggahaṃ kātukāmo evaṃ cintesi,
atk-s0303a0:248_4: ahamettha ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti purato pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0303a0:248_5: Santettha bhikkhūti idaṃ so mahābrahmā yathā nāma byatto sūdo yadeva ambilaggādīsu rasajātaṃ rañño ruccati,
atk-s0303a0:248_6: taṃ abhisaṅkhārena sādutaraṃ katvā punadivase upanāmeti,
atk-s0303a0:248_7: evameva attano byattatāya bhagavatā āhaṭaupamaṃyeva evametaṃ bhagavātiādivacanehi abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0303a0:248_11: Abhivadatūti āgatassa ca ovādānusāsaniṃ dadanto abhivadatu.
atk-s0303a0:249_2: Ekadvīhikāyāti ekeko ceva dve dve ca hutvā.
atk-s0303a0:249_4: Kasmā pana bhagavā tesaṃ tathā upasaṅkamanāya iddhimakāsīti?

atk-s0303a0:249_7: “bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇāmetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho ekadivasampi tattha vasituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0303a0:249_11: Sabhayānaṃ pana sasārajjānaṃ ekadvīhikāya āgacchantānaṃ buddhagāravañceva paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati,

atk-s0303a0:250_0: Nisīdiṃsūti tesu hi sārajjamānarūpesu āgacchantesu eko bhikkhu “mamaṃyeva satthā oloketi,

atk-s0303a0:250_10: Atha nesaṃ taṃ dhammadesanaṃ desento antamidaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:251_1: Yadidaṃ piṇḍolyanti yaṃ evaṃ piṇḍapariyesanena jīvikaṃ kappentassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:251_7: Kupitā hi manussā attano paccatthikaṃ “cīvaraṃ nivāsetvā kapālaṃ gahetvā piṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno carissatī”ti akkosanti.
atk-s0303a0:251_8: Atha vā pana “kiṃ tuyhaṃ akātabbaṃ atthi,
atk-s0303a0:251_9: yo tvaṃ evaṃ balavā vīriyasampannopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kapaṇo viya piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī”ti?

atk-s0303a0:252_0: Rājābhinītātiādīsu ye rañño santakaṃ khāditvā raññā bandhanāgāre bandhāpitā palāyitvā pabbajanti,
atk-s0303a0:252_2: Te hi raññā bandhanaṃ abhinītattā rājābhinītā nāma.
atk-s0303a0:252_3: Ye pana corehi aṭaviyaṃ gahetvā ekaccesu māriyamānesu ekacce “mayaṃ sāmi tumhehi vissaṭṭhā gehaṃ anajjhāvasitvā pabbajissāma,
atk-s0303a0:252_5: tato tumhākaṃ pattiṃ dassāmā”ti tehi vissaṭṭhā pabbajanti,
atk-s0303a0:252_7: Tepi hi corehi māretabbataṃ abhinītāti corābhinītā nāma.
atk-s0303a0:252_8: Ye pana iṇaṃ gahetvā paṭidātuṃ asakkontā palāyitvā pabbajanti,
atk-s0303a0:252_13: Ye rājacorachātakarogabhayānaṃ aññatarena abhibhūtā upaddutā pabbajanti,
atk-s0303a0:253_0: So ca hoti abhijjhālūti idaṃ so kulaputto “dukkhassa antaṃ karissāmī”tiādivasena cittaṃ uppādetvā pabbajito,
atk-s0303a0:253_2: taṃ pabbajjaṃ tathārūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0303a0:253_12: Asamāhitoti caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya upacārappanābhāvena asaṇṭhito.
atk-s0303a0:253_14: Pākatindriyoti yathā gihī puttadhītaro olokento asaṃvutindriyo hoti,
atk-s0303a0:254_1: Ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagatanti pamāṇena aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu ādittaṃ majjhe gūthamakkhitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:254_2: Neva gāmeti sace hi taṃ yuganaṅgalagopānasipakkhapāsakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa,

atk-s0303a0:254_10: Sāmaññatthañcāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā pariyattipaṭivedhavasena pattabbaṃ sāmaññatthañca.
atk-s0303a0:254_11: Imañca pana upamaṃ satthā na dussīlassa vasena āhari,

atk-s0303a0:255_6: So hi niccanimittādīnaṃ samugghātanena animittoti vuccati.

atk-s0303a0:256_6: Iti bhagavā imasmimpi sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi vinivattetvā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0303a0:256_7: Desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.

atk-s0303a0:260_2: tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā “samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne tayo kulaputte passissāmī”ti

atk-s0303a0:261_1: tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0303a0:261_2: Bhaddasālo pana tattheko manāpo laddhako sālarukkho.
atk-s0303a0:261_3: Bhagavā taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle viharati.
atk-s0303a0:262_0: Evaṃ viharante panettha tathāgate aññataro hatthināgo hatthinīhi hatthipotakādīhi gocarabhūmititthogāhanādīsu
atk-s0303a0:262_1: ubbāḷho yūthe ukkaṇṭhito “kiṃ me imehi hatthīhī”ti?
atk-s0303a0:262_2: Yūthaṃ pahāya manussapathaṃ gacchanto pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo
atk-s0303a0:262_3: viya nibbuto hutvā satthu santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0303a0:262_4: So tato paṭṭhāya satthu vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto mukhadhovanaṃ deti,
atk-s0303a0:262_8: araññato madhurāni phalāphalāni āharitvā satthuno deti.
atk-s0303a0:263_0: Ekadivasaṃ satthā rattibhāgasamanantare caṅkamitvā pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0303a0:263_2: Satthā pacchato oloketvā na kiñci addasa,
atk-s0303a0:263_4: Athassa “sukhaṃ vatāhaṃ aññatra tehi bhaṇḍanakārakehi vasāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0303a0:263_5: Hatthinopi “mayā nāmitasākhaṃ aññe khādantā natthī”tiādīni cintetvā –
atk-s0303a0:263_7: satthu vattaṃ kātuṃ labhāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0303a0:263_10: kīdisaṃ nu kho hatthissā”ti tassāpi tādisameva disvā “sameti no citta”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0303a0:265_0: Sameti cittaṃ cittena, yadeko ramatī vane”ti. ;
atk-s0303a0:266_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhūti atha evaṃ tathāgate tattha viharante pañcasatā disāsu vassaṃvutthā bhikkhū.

atk-s0303a0:294_2: Thero kira uttānako nipanno satthaṃ āhari.
atk-s0303a0:294_5: Ariyasāvakā hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapasseneva kālaṃ karonti.

atk-s0303a0:296_8: Samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññāti samādhiṃyeva sārañca sāmaññañca maññanti.

atk-s0303a0:296_13: Athassa tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasāne arahattaṃ pattassa satatavihāraṃ dassento so sukhaṃ ce vedanaṃ vedayatītiādimāha.
atk-s0303a0:296_14: Tattha anabhinanditāti pajānātīti sukhavedanāya tāva abhinandanā hotu,

atk-s0303a0:298_2: Asmīti adhigatanti asmīti evaṃ pavattā taṇhāmānā adhigatā.
atk-s0303a0:298_5: Dāsakatthero pana catukkhattuṃ gamanāgamanena taṃdivasaṃ dviyojanaṃ addhānaṃ āhiṇḍi.
atk-s0303a0:298_10: tattha saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā okāso natthīti na gatā.
atk-s0303a0:298_11: “Idhāgantvā amhākaṃ dhammaṃ kathetū”tipi kasmā pana na pahiṇiṃsūti?
atk-s0303a0:299_1: rūpanti yo hi rūpameva asmīti vadati,
atk-s0303a0:299_2: tena itare cattāro khandhā paccakkhātā honti.
atk-s0303a0:299_6: Therassa pana samūhato pañcasupi khandhesu asmīti adhigato,
atk-s0303a0:300_3: tīhi khārehi dhotavatthaṃ viya desanāya madditvā ṭhito anāgāmino cittācāro,

atk-s0303a0:301_7: Saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānanti te kira therena kathitakathitaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā uparūpari sammasantā desanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.

atk-s0303a0:303_1: Aṭṭhame āyasmā channoti tathāgatena saddhiṃ ekadivase jāto mahābhinikkhamanadivase saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0303a0:303_2: puna aparabhāge satthu santike pabbajitvā “amhākaṃ buddho amhākaṃ dhammo”ti evaṃ makkhī ceva paḷāsī ca
atk-s0303a0:303_3: hutvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ pharusavācāya saṅghaṭṭanaṃ karonto thero.
atk-s0303a0:303_5: Vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā tato aññaṃ,

atk-s0303a0:303_10: So dinne brahmadaṇḍe sañjātapariḷāho visaññībhūto patitvā puna saññaṃ labhitvā vuṭṭhāya ekassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gato,

atk-s0303a0:304_9: evaṃ niddosamevassa katvā kathessāmā”ti dveva lakkhaṇāni kathayiṃsu.

atk-s0303a0:314_1: Dutiye vivadatīti “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubha”nti yathāsabhāvena vadantena saddhiṃ “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti vadanto vivadati.

atk-s0303a0:317_7: antarā pana abhijjantopi mahāsamuddaṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati.
atk-s0303a0:318_2: Yathā ca so “iminā pattaṃ vā thālakaṃ vā karissāmī”ti gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a0:318_5: evaṃ rūpampi niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a0:318_7: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubhaññeva hotīti evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍasadisameva hoti.
atk-s0303a0:318_8: Yathā vā pana pheṇapiṇḍo chiddāvachiddo anekasandhighaṭito bahūnaṃ udakasappādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ āvāso,
atk-s0303a0:318_11: tadeva tesaṃ sūtigharampi vaccakuṭipi gilānasālāpi susānampi,

atk-s0303a0:319_0: Yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo ādito badarapakkamatto hutvā anupubbena pabbatakūṭamattopi hoti,
atk-s0303a0:319_1: evaṃ rūpampi ādito kalalamattaṃ hutvā anupubbena byāmamattampi gomahiṃsahatthiādīnaṃ vasena pabbatakūṭādimattaṃ
atk-s0303a0:319_9: antarā pana abhijjamānampi vassasatāyukānaṃ vassasataṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati,
atk-s0303a0:320_2: vedanāya sārotiādīsu vedanādīnaṃ pubbuḷādīhi evaṃ sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a0:320_3: Yathā hi pubbuḷo asāro evaṃ vedanāpi.
atk-s0303a0:320_5: na sakkā taṃ gahetvā phalakaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā kātuṃ,
atk-s0303a0:320_8: na sakkā niccāti vā dhuvāti vā gahetuṃ,
atk-s0303a0:320_11: Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udakabindumhi pubbuḷo uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca,
atk-s0303a0:320_13: evaṃ vedanāpi uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca,
atk-s0303a0:320_19: saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati,
atk-s0303a0:320_20: evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ kilesajallaṃ phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-s0303a0:321_2: Na hi sakkā taṃ gahetvā pivituṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ.

atk-s0303a0:321_6: Yathā ca marīci mahājanaṃ vippalambheti “puṇṇavāpi viya puṇṇanadī viya dissatī”ti vadāpeti,
atk-s0303a0:322_3: Yatheva hi kadalikkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasiādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ,

atk-s0303a0:322_14: samodhānetvā pana saṅkhārakkhandhova vuccatīti evampi saṅkhārakkhandho kadalikkhandhasadiso.

atk-s0303a0:324_4: Etādisāyaṃ santānoti etādisī ayaṃ paveṇī matakassa yāva susānā ghaṭṭīyatīti.
atk-s0303a0:324_7: Vadhakoti dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ khandhasaṅkhāto vadhako aññamaññaghātanenapi,
atk-s0303a0:324_9: Ekā hi pathavīdhātu bhijjamānā sesadhātuyo gahetvāva bhijjati,
atk-s0303a0:324_11: Rūpakkhandho ca bhijjamāno arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati,
atk-s0303a0:324_13: Cattāropi cete vatthurūpanti evaṃ aññamaññavadhanenettha vadhakatā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a0:324_15: evaṃ etesu sati vadhabhāvatopi vadhakatā veditabbā.
atk-s0303a0:326_5: Atthassa pana viññāpanatthaṃ iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā hatthāruḷhaṃ katanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0303a0:326_7: Na yidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyethāti ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyavāso nāma na paññāyeyya.
atk-s0303a0:326_9: Yadi ca ettako attabhāvo nicco bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a0:326_10: maggo uppajjitvāpi saṅkhāravaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti brahmacariyavāso na paññāyetha.
atk-s0303a0:327_0: Idāni sace koci saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a0:327_1: mayā mahāsudassanarājakāle anubhūtā sampatti niccā bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a0:327_2: sāpi ca aniccāti taṃ dassetuṃ bhūtapubbāhaṃ bhikkhu rājā ahosintiādimāha.
atk-s0303a0:327_3: Tattha kusāvatīrājadhānippamukhānīti kusāvatīrājadhānī tesaṃ nagarānaṃ pamukhā,
atk-s0303a0:327_12: Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbetvā karonti.
atk-s0303a0:327_16: Vejayantarathappamukhānīti ettha vejayanto nāma tassa rañño ratho,
atk-s0303a0:327_26: Vatthakoṭisahassānīti yathārucitaṃ paribhuñjissatīti nhatvā ṭhitakāle upanītavatthāneva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:328_0: Yamahaṃ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmīti yattha vasāmi,
atk-s0303a0:328_2: avasesesu puttadhītādayo ceva dāsamanussā ca vasiṃsu.
atk-s0303a0:328_11: sesāni parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ asītisahassādhikānaṃ soḷasannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hontīti dasseti.
atk-s0303a0:328_13: sesaṃ parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ cattālīsasahassādhikānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0303a0:329_0: Iti imaṃ mahāsudassanakāle sampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tassā aniccataṃ dassento iti kho bhikkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0303a0:329_1: Tattha vipariṇatāti pakatijahanena nibbutapadīpo viya apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatā.
atk-s0303a0:329_2: Evaṃ aniccā kho bhikkhu saṅkhārāti evaṃ hutvāabhāvaṭṭhena aniccā.
atk-s0303a0:329_3: Ettāvatā bhagavā yathā nāma puriso satahatthubbedhe campakarukkhe nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā abhiruhitvā campakapupphaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto otareyya,
atk-s0303a0:329_4: evamevaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhanto viya anekavassakoṭisatasahassubbedhaṃ mahāsudassanasampattiṃ āruyha sampattimatthake
atk-s0303a0:329_5: ṭhitaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto viya otiṇṇo.
atk-s0303a0:329_6: Evaṃ addhuvāti evaṃ udakapubbuḷādayo viya dhuvabhāvarahitā.
atk-s0303a0:329_7: Evaṃ anassāsikāti evaṃ supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ viya ca assāsavirahitā.
atk-s0303a0:331_1: Sattame yaṃ mahāsamuddoti yasmiṃ samaye pañcame sūriye uṭṭhite mahāsamuddo ussussati.
atk-s0303a0:331_2: Dukkhassa antakiriyanti cattāri saccāni appaṭivijjhitvā avijjāya nivutānaṃyeva sataṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyaṃ paricchedaṃ na vadāmi.
atk-s0303a0:331_6: Evameva khoti ettha sunakho viya vaṭṭanissito bālo,
atk-s0303a0:331_9: gaddularajjuyā thambhe upanibaddhasunakhassa thambhānuparivattanaṃ viya diṭṭhitaṇhāya sakkāye baddhassa
atk-s0303a0:333_1: Aṭṭhame tasmāti yasmā diṭṭhigaddulanissitāya taṇhārajjuyā sakkāyathambhe upanibaddho vaṭṭanissito bālaputhujjano
atk-s0303a0:333_3: yasmā vā dīgharattamidaṃ cittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ rāgena dosena mohena, tasmā.
atk-s0303a0:333_4: Cittasaṃkilesāti sunhātāpi hi sattā cittasaṃkileseneva saṃkilissanti,
atk-s0303a0:337_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti.
atk-s0303a0:338_2: te paṭakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā tattha nānappakārā sugatiduggativasena sampattivipattiyo lekhāpetvā,
atk-s0303a0:338_4: idaṃ katvā ida”nti dassentā taṃ cittaṃ gahetvā vicaranti.
atk-s0303a0:338_5: Citteneva cittitanti cittakārena cintetvā katattā cittena cintitaṃ nāma.
atk-s0303a0:338_6: Cittaññeva cittataranti tassa cittassa upāyapariyesanacittaṃ tatopi cittataraṃ.
atk-s0303a0:338_7: Tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittitāti kammacitteneva cittitā.
atk-s0303a0:338_8: Taṃ pana kammacittaṃ ime vaṭṭakatittirādayo “evaṃ cittā bhavissāmā”ti āyūhantā nāma natthi.
atk-s0303a0:338_11: Yoniupagatā hi sattā taṃtaṃyonikehi sadisacittāva honti.
atk-s0303a0:339_0: Apica cittaṃ nāmetaṃ sahajātaṃ sahajātadhammacittatāya bhūmicittatāya vatthucittatāya dvāracittatāya
atk-s0303a0:340_1: So pana acheko amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ karoti,
atk-s0303a0:340_3: evameva puthujjano akusalacittena vā ñāṇavippayuttakusalena vā cakkhusampadādivirahitaṃ virūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0303a0:342_3: kukkuṭiyā aṇḍānīti imā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena dve upamā vuttā.
atk-s0303a0:342_11: Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti,
atk-s0303a0:342_16: Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya ca janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni.
atk-s0303a0:342_17: Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni usmīkatāni.
atk-s0303a0:342_18: Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni,
atk-s0303a0:342_20: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyāti tassā kukkuṭiyā iminā tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā upajjeyya.
atk-s0303a0:342_21: Atha kho bhabbāva teti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā vuttanayena sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva.
atk-s0303a0:342_22: Te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni honti,
atk-s0303a0:342_28: kapālassa tanuttā bahi āloko anto paññāyati,
atk-s0303a0:342_29: tasmā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimhā,
atk-s0303a0:342_31: ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti,
atk-s0303a0:342_34: Atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamantiyeva,
atk-s0303a0:343_2: tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno bhāvānuyogaṃ anuyuttakālo,
atk-s0303a0:343_3: kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0303a0:343_5: tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:343_6: aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya tassa bhikkhuno avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo,
atk-s0303a0:343_7: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhamukhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasanna sūrabhāvo,
atk-s0303a0:343_8: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇāmakālo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhitakālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo,
atk-s0303a0:343_9: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0303a0:343_10: abhinibbhidākālo viya tassa bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ
atk-s0303a0:343_11: vā bhojanasappāyaṃ vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0303a0:343_12: vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0303a0:343_14: Yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0303a0:343_15: evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi –
atk-s0303a0:346_0: Ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati.
atk-s0303a0:346_1: So gāthāpariyosāne avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0303a0:346_2: Tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha vicaranti,
atk-s0303a0:346_3: evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā saṅghārāmaṃ upasobhayamāno vicarati.
atk-s0303a0:347_1: So hi olambakasaṅkhātaṃ palaṃ dhāretvā dārūnaṃ gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti vuccati.
atk-s0303a0:347_3: Ettakaṃ vata me ajja āsavānaṃ khīṇanti pabbajitassa hi pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesena paripucchāya yoniso
atk-s0303a0:347_4: manasikārena vattapaṭipattiyā ca niccakālaṃ āsavā khīyanti.
atk-s0303a0:347_5: Evaṃ khīyamānānaṃ pana tesaṃ “ettakaṃ ajja khīṇaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:347_6: ettakaṃ hiyyo”ti evamassa ñāṇaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0303a0:348_0: Evameva khoti ettha mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:348_2: nāvāya mahāsamudde pariyādānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno ūnapañcavassakāle ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vicaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:348_3: nāvāya mahāsamuddodakena khajjamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bhikkhuno pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesaparipucchādīhi ceva saṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo,
atk-s0303a0:348_4: nāvāya thale ukkhittakālo viya bhikkhuno nissayamuccakassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanakālo,
atk-s0303a0:348_5: divā vātātapena saṃsussanaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇena taṇhāsnehasaṃsussanaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:348_6: rattiṃ himodakena temanaṃ viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya uppannena pītipāmojjena cittatemanaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:348_7: rattindivaṃ vātātapena ceva himodakena ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0303a0:348_8: utusappāyādīni laddhā vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya dubbalabhāvo,
atk-s0303a0:348_10: meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya bandhe pūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa
atk-s0303a0:348_11: okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa arahattaphalādhigamo,
atk-s0303a0:348_12: pūtibandhanāvāya kañci kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:348_13: pūtibandhanāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa upādiṇṇakkhandhabhedena
atk-s0303a0:348_14: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoti imāya upamāya saṃyojanānaṃ dubbalatā dīpitā. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:350_1: Dasame aniccasaññāti aniccaṃ aniccanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0303a0:350_7: yathā kassako kasanto naṅgalena tāni padāleti,
atk-s0303a0:350_8: evaṃ yogī aniccasaññaṃ bhāvento aniccasaññāñāṇena kilese padāletīti idamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:351_4: lāyanaṃ nicchoṭanaṃ viya aniccasaññāñāṇanti iminā atthena upamā saṃsandetabbā.
atk-s0303a0:352_5: yathā khurappena chinnāya ambapiṇḍiyā sabbāni ambāni bhūmiyaṃ patanti,
atk-s0303a0:352_6: evaṃ aniccasaññāñāṇena kilesānaṃ mūlabhūtāya avijjāya chinnāya sabbakilesā samugghātaṃ gacchantīti,
atk-s0303a0:353_11: Iminā upāyena sabbāsu upamāsu opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:358_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ catusaccavasena pañcakkhandhe yojetvā antoti vacanena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:360_1: Dutiyampi pañcakkhandhe catusaccavasena yojetvā dukkhanti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:360_2: Tatiyampi tatheva sakkāyoti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:362_3: Pariññātāvinti tāya pariññāya parijānitvā samatikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:364_0: 107-112. Pañcamādīsu catūsu cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Navamadasamesu kilesappahānanti. Pañcamādīni.
atk-s0303a0:368_1: Dhammakathikavaggassa paṭhame ettāvatā ca avijjāgato hotīti yāvatā imāya catūsu saccesu aññāṇabhūtāya avijjāya samannāgato,
atk-s0303a0:370_3: tatiyena asekhabhūmīti evaṃ dhammakathikaṃ pucchitena visesetvā dve bhūmiyo kathitā. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:372_0: 116. Catutthe tissannampi pucchānaṃ tīṇi vissajjanāni kathitāni. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:374_5: Baddhoti kilesabandhanena baddho hutvā jīyati ca mīyati ca asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0303a0:376_5: tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇḍānaṃ paccayabhāvena vā khaṇanaṭṭhena vā sallato dukkhaṭṭhena aghato,
atk-s0303a0:384_0: 126-135. Avijjāvaggo uttānatthova. Imasmiñhi vagge sabbasuttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:388_1: Kukkuḷavaggassa paṭhame kukkuḷanti santattaṃ ādittaṃ chārikarāsiṃ viya mahāpariḷāhaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:392_1: Diṭṭhivaggassa paṭhame kiṃ upādāyāti kiṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0303a0:394_1: Dasame upasaṅkamīti aññe bhikkhū pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjitvā ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0303a0:394_2: satthu santike aññaṃ byākaronte disvā “ahampi pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjanto ghaṭento,
atk-s0303a0:394_3: arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākarissāmī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0303a0:394_4: Satthā pana attano dharamānakāle therassa uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ apassantopi “imassa cittaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kathesi.
atk-s0303a0:394_5: Tassāpi ekaṃ dve vāre manasi katvāva buddhupaṭṭhānavelā jātāti gantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0303a0:394_6: Itissa cittaṃ sampahaṃsamāno vimuttiparipācanīyadhammova so kammaṭṭhānānuyogo jātoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:400_1: Rādhasaṃyuttassa paṭhame māro vā assāti maraṇaṃ vā bhaveyya.
atk-s0303a0:400_3: Yo vā pana mīyatīti yo vā pana marati.
atk-s0303a0:402_2: Tatra satto tatra visattoti tatra laggo tatra vilaggo.
atk-s0303a0:402_9: Vikīḷaniyaṃ karontīti “niṭṭhitā kīḷā”ti te bhindamānā kīḷāvigamaṃ karonti.
atk-s0303a0:406_3: Yasmā pana rūpādivinimuttaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0303a0:410_3: Tathāgatassa imaṃ theraṃ disvā sukhumaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0303a0:410_5: Evaṃ imasmiṃ rādhasaṃyutte ādito dve vaggā pucchāvasena desitā,
atk-s0303a0:410_8: Sakalampi panetaṃ rādhasaṃyuttaṃ therassa vimuttiparipācanīyadhammavaseneva gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:414_1: Diṭṭhisaṃyutte na vātā vāyantītiādīsu evaṃ kira tesaṃ diṭṭhi –
atk-s0303a0:414_5: vāto pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito.
atk-s0303a0:414_6: Tathā yāpi etā tiṇakaṭṭhādīni vahantiyo nadiyo sandanti,
atk-s0303a0:414_9: udakaṃ pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:414_14: gabbho pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito.
atk-s0303a0:414_15: Yepi ete candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā,
atk-s0303a0:414_18: candimasūriyā pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0303a0:416_4: Tañhi patvā gahetabbato mutanti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:416_6: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:416_7: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā apattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:416_15: Apariyesitvā pattañca apariyesitvā nopattañca manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma.
atk-s0303a0:416_16: Atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma,
atk-s0303a0:418_1: Natthi dinnantiādīsu natthi dinnanti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:418_7: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati,
atk-s0303a0:418_9: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi.
atk-s0303a0:418_10: Natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassapi paro loko natthi,
atk-s0303a0:418_12: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:418_13: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:418_14: Natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇāti loke sammāpaṭipannā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:419_1: Pathavī pathavīkāyanti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ.
atk-s0303a0:419_11: cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho.
atk-s0303a0:419_22: na tato paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0303a0:421_7: Socato socāpayatoti parassa bhaṇḍaharaṇādīhi sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassāpi parehi kārentassāpi.
atk-s0303a0:421_8: Kilamato kilamāpayatoti āhārupacchedabandhanāgārapavesanādīhi sayaṃ kilamentassapi parehi kilamāpentassapi.
atk-s0303a0:421_9: Phandato phandāpayatoti paraṃ phandantaṃ phandanakāle sayampi phandato parempi phandāpayato.
atk-s0303a0:422_3: Paripanthe tiṭṭhatoti āgatāgatānaṃ acchindanatthaṃ magge tiṭṭhato.
atk-s0303a0:422_4: Karoto na karīyati pāpanti yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ karomīti saññāya karotopi pāpaṃ na karīyati,
atk-s0303a0:422_6: Sattā pana karomāti evaṃsaññino hontīti dīpenti.
atk-s0303a0:423_2: Uttaranti uttaratīre saddhā honti pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
atk-s0303a0:425_1: Natthi hetu natthi paccayoti ettha paccayoti hetuvevacanameva.
atk-s0303a0:425_4: Natthi balanti yamhi attano bale patiṭṭhitā ime sattā devattampi mārattampi brahmattampi sāvakabodhimpi paccekabodhimpi sabbaññutampi pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0303a0:426_3: Sabbe bhūtāti aṇḍakosavatthikosesu bhūte sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:426_6: Avasā abalā avīriyāti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0303a0:426_8: Saṅgatīti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:426_10: Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā.
atk-s0303a0:426_15: Chasvevābhijātīsūti chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti,
atk-s0303a0:428_3: “evaṃ karohī”ti kenaci kāritāpi na hontīti attho.
atk-s0303a0:428_8: Vañjhāti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā kassaci ajanakā.
atk-s0303a0:428_13: Na iñjantīti esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā na calanti.
atk-s0303a0:428_15: Na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti aññamaññaṃ na upahananti.
atk-s0303a0:428_19: Sattannaṃtveva kāyānanti yathā muggarāsiādīsu pahaṭaṃ satthaṃ muggarāsiādīnaṃ antareneva pavisati,
atk-s0303a0:428_20: evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0303a0:428_21: Tattha “ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī”ti kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hotīti dassenti.
atk-s0303a0:429_0: Yonipamukhasatasahassānīti pamukhayonīnaṃ uttamayonīnaṃ cuddasasatasahassāni aññāni ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni
atk-s0303a0:429_1: ca chasatāni pañca ca kammuno satānīti pañcakammasatāni cāti kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakadiṭṭhiṃ dīpenti.
atk-s0303a0:429_2: Pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0303a0:429_5: Kamme ca aḍḍhakamme cāti ettha panassa kāyakammavacīkammāni kammanti laddhi,
atk-s0303a0:429_8: Dvaṭṭhantarakappāti ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti,
atk-s0303a0:429_9: ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha.
atk-s0303a0:430_0: Chaḷābhijātiyoti kaṇhābhijāti nīlābhijāti lohitābhijāti haliddābhijāti sukkābhijāti paramasukkābhijātīti imā cha abhijātiyo vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:430_1: Tattha orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā māgavikā luddā macchaghātakā corā coraghātakā bandhanāgārikā,
atk-s0303a0:430_5: Te kira catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti,
atk-s0303a0:430_6: “bhikkhū ca kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti ayaṃ hissa pāḷi eva.
atk-s0303a0:430_7: Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke pabbajitāti vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:430_11: Evaṃ attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karonti.
atk-s0303a0:431_0: Aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti mandabhūmi khiḍḍābhūmi vīmaṃsakabhūmi ujugatabhūmi sekhabhūmi samaṇabhūmi jānanabhūmi
atk-s0303a0:431_2: Tattha jātadivasato paṭṭhāya satta divase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā,
atk-s0303a0:431_5: te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti ca,
atk-s0303a0:431_6: sugatito āgatā taṃ anussaritvā anussaritvā hasanti,
atk-s0303a0:431_8: Mātāpitūnaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ vīmaṃsakabhūmi nāma.
atk-s0303a0:431_13: “Bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhā”ti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a0:433_6: Ettha ekamhā mahāsarā vassasate vassasate kusaggena ekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharitvā sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake kate eko mahākappoti vadati.
atk-s0303a0:433_7: Evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni khepetvā bāle ca paṇḍite ca dukkhassantaṃ karontīti ayamassa laddhi.
atk-s0303a0:434_0: Sīlena vāti acelakasīlena vā aññena vā yena kenaci.
atk-s0303a0:434_3: Aparipakkaṃ paripāceti nāma yo “ahaṃ paṇḍito”ti antarā visujjhati.
atk-s0303a0:434_4: Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa byantīkaroti nāma yo “ahaṃ bālo”ti vuttaparimāṇakālaṃ atikkamitvā yāti.
atk-s0303a0:434_6: Tañhi ubhayampi na sakkā kātunti dīpeti.
atk-s0303a0:434_15: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento seyyathāpi nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0303a0:434_17: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā khittaṃ suttappamāṇena nibbeṭhiyamānameva gacchati,
atk-s0303a0:434_19: na gacchati evameva bālā ca paṇḍitā ca kālavasena nibbeṭhiyamānā sukhadukkhaṃ palenti,
atk-s0303a0:436_1: Antavā lokoti ekato vaḍḍhitanimittaṃ lokoti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a0:436_2: Anantavāti sabbato vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇanimittaṃ lokoti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a0:436_3: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti jīvañca sarīrañca ekamevāti uppannadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a0:436_5: Imāni tāva sotāpattimaggavasena aṭṭhārasa veyyākaraṇāni ekaṃ gamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:438_3: tato parāni “rūpī attā hotī”tiādīni aṭṭha veyyākaraṇāni,
atk-s0303a0:439_2: Rūpī ca arūpī cāti ārammaṇañca jhānañca “attā”ti gahitadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0303a0:439_5: Jhānalābhinopi hi atīte ekantasukhaṃ attabhāvaṃ manasikaroto evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati.
atk-s0303a0:439_8: Jātissarassapi sattaṭṭhabhave sukhitabhāvaṃ passantassa evaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0303a0:440_0: Tatiyapeyyālo aniccadukkhavasena tehiyeva chabbīsatiyā suttehi vutto,
atk-s0303a0:443_3: Abhabbo ca tāva kālaṃ kātunti iminā uppanne magge phalassa anantarāyataṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0303a0:443_4: Uppannasmiñhi magge phalassa antarāyakaraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0303a0:443_11: Mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamantīti pamāṇato olokanaṃ khamanti.
atk-s0303a0:447_6: So hi tassa uppajjituṃ appadānena upakkilesoti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a0:447_9: Abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesūti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena abhijānitvā sacchikātabbesu chaḷabhiññādhammesu,
atk-s0303a0:447_10: ekaṃ dhammaṃ vā gaṇhantena nekkhammanti gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:450_1: Sāriputtasaṃyuttassa paṭhame na evaṃ hotīti ahaṅkāramamaṅkārānaṃ pahīnattā evaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0303a0:452_2: Upasaṅkamīti theraṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ samantapāsādikaṃ disvā “iminā saddhiṃ parihāsaṃ karissāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0303a0:452_3: Atha therena tasmiṃ vacane paṭikkhitte “idānissa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti maññamānā tena hi, samaṇa,
atk-s0303a0:453_5: Micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentīti teneva vatthuvijjātiracchānavijjāsaṅkhātena micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappenti,
atk-s0303a0:453_6: tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ sampādanena pasannehi manussehi dinne paccaye paribhuñjantā jīvantīti attho.
atk-s0303a0:453_7: Adhomukhāti vatthuṃ oloketvā bhuñjamānavasena adhomukhā bhuñjanti nāma.
atk-s0303a0:453_9: Api cettha nakkhattavijjāti “ajja imaṃ nakkhattaṃ iminā nakkhattena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:453_12: tesaṃ tesaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:453_13: Pahiṇagamananti ekagāmasmiṃyeva ekakulassa sāsanena aññakulaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:453_14: Aṅgavijjāti itthilakkhaṇapurisalakkhaṇavasena aṅgasampattiṃ ñatvā “tāya aṅgasampattiyā idaṃ nāma labbhatī”ti evaṃ jānanavijjā.
atk-s0303a0:453_15: Vidisāmukhāti aṅgavijjā hi taṃ taṃ sarīrakoṭṭhāsaṃ ārabbha pavattattā vidisāya pavattā nāma,
atk-s0303a0:453_16: tasmā tāya vijjāya jīvikaṃ kappetvā bhuñjantā vidisāmukhā bhuñjanti nāma.
atk-s0303a0:453_17: Evamārocesīti “dhammikaṃ samaṇā”tiādīni vadamānā sāsanassa niyyānikaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0303a0:453_18: Tañca paribbājikāya kathaṃ sutvā pañcamattāni kulasatāni sāsane otariṃsūti.
atk-s0303a0:456_6: Bhikkhūnañhi “kati nu kho nāgayoniyo”ti kathā udapādi.
atk-s0303a0:456_7: Atha bhagavā puggalānaṃ nāgayonīhi uddharaṇatthaṃ nāgayoniyo āvikaronto imaṃ suttamāha.
atk-s0303a0:458_11: Yānanti chattupāhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā yaṃkiñci gamanapaccayaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:458_15: Seyyāvasathapadīpeyyanti mañcapīṭhādiseyyaṃ ekabhūmikādiāvasathaṃ vaṭṭitelādipadīpūpakaraṇañca detīti attho.
atk-s0303a0:458_16: Tesañhi dīghāyukatāya ca vaṇṇavantatāya ca sukhabahulatāya ca patthanaṃ katvā imaṃ dasavidhaṃ dānavatthuṃ
atk-s0303a0:458_17: datvā taṃ sampattiṃ anubhavituṃ tattha nibbattanti.
atk-s0303a0:460_1: Supaṇṇasaṃyutte pattānaṃ vaṇṇavantatāya garuḷā supaṇṇāti vuttā.
atk-s0303a0:460_4: Uddharamānā ca pana te attanā hīne vā same vā uddharituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0303a0:460_6: Sattavidhā hi anuddharaṇīyanāgā nāma paṇītatarā kambalassatarā dhataraṭṭhā sattasīdantaravāsino pathaviṭṭhakā pabbataṭṭhakā vimānaṭṭhakāti.
atk-s0303a0:460_10: te yattha katthaci disvā yo koci supaṇṇo uddharituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a0:460_14: te yasmā katthaci vikampanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a0:460_19: te yo koci samo vā paṇītataro vā supaṇṇo uddharituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0303a0:462_1: Gandhabbakāyasaṃyutte mūlagandhe adhivatthāti yassa rukkhassa mūle gandho atthi,
atk-s0303a0:462_3: So hi sakalopi rukkho tesaṃ upakappati.
atk-s0303a0:462_6: Yassa hi rukkhassa sabbesampi mūlādīnaṃ gandho atthi,
atk-s0303a0:462_11: So dātā hoti mūlagandhānanti so kāḷānusārikādīnaṃ mūlagandhānaṃ dātā hoti.
atk-s0303a0:462_15: Taṃ dassetuṃ so annaṃ detītiādi dasavidhaṃ dānavatthu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a0:464_1: Valāhakasaṃyutte valāhakakāyikāti valāhakanāmake devakāye uppannā ākāsacārikadevā.
atk-s0303a0:464_5: Sītaṃ hotīti yaṃ vassāne vā hemante vā sītaṃ hoti,
atk-s0303a0:464_16: Idhāpi yaṃ vassāne ca sisire ca abbhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0303a0:464_22: Vāto hotīti yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ utumhi uttaradakkhiṇādipakativāto hoti,
atk-s0303a0:464_24: Yopi pana rukkhakkhandhādipadālano ativāto nāma atthi, ayañceva,
atk-s0303a0:464_27: Devo vassatīti yaṃ vassike cattāro māse vassaṃ,
atk-s0303a0:465_1: eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto talakūṭakavāsi khīṇāsavattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0303a0:465_13: “Sādhu devaputtā”ti so pāde dhovitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0303a0:465_14: Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipi.
atk-s0303a0:465_17: Apica devo nāmesa aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi vassati nāgānubhāvena supaṇṇānubhāvena devatānubhāvena saccakiriyāya
atk-s0303a0:467_4: Imasmiñca pana saṃyutte ekādasa suttāni pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0303a0:470_1: Jhānasaṃyuttassa paṭhame samādhikusaloti paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ dutiyaṃ tivaṅgikanti evaṃ aṅgavavatthānakusalo.
atk-s0303a0:470_2: Na samādhismiṃ samāpattikusaloti cittaṃ hāsetvā kallaṃ katvā jhānaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a0:472_1: Dutiyādīsu na samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusaloti jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ akusalo,
atk-s0303a0:472_3: Na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusaloti jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ akusalo,
atk-s0303a0:472_5: Na samādhismiṃ kallitakusaloti cittaṃ hāsetvā kallaṃ kātuṃ akusalo.
atk-s0303a0:472_7: Na samādhismiṃ gocarakusaloti kammaṭṭhānagocare ceva bhikkhācāragocare ca akusalo.
atk-s0303a0:472_8: Na samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusaloti kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhinīharituṃ akusalo.
atk-s0303a0:472_9: Na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārīti jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkaccakārī na hoti.
atk-s0303a0:472_10: Na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārīti jhānappanāya satatakārī na hoti,
atk-s0303a0:472_12: Na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārīti samādhissa sappāye upakārakadhamme pūretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0303a0:472_13: Tato paraṃ samāpattiādīhi padehi yojetvā catukkā vuttā.
